definitions: bearing all or part of the weight of something

examples.text: supporting structures for the elevated roads will be brought to site by huge trailers
he offered no supporting evidence for this opinion

definitions: (of an actor or role) important in a play or film but of lesser importance than the leading parts

examples.text: his performance is excellent but he is more than matched by the supporting cast

shortDefinitions: of secondary importance to leading roles in play or film
